comments.body: Is the intention to remove one of the copies of this file?
The copy has been already removed from the integration tests because the semantic tests have been already ~eradicated~ removed from there as well.
Uh, what I just said is wrong. Removing the original as of now. Good catch, thanks!

diffHunk:

+}
